segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her movements are so calm and practiced, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, is the sink actually overflowing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yes, water is steadily pouring over the edge of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating quite a large puddle on the floor and running down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice it at all, which is baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the cold water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that dampness and the spreading wetness?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This continuous flow will cause significant water damage if it keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with her serene, focused face is really striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's completely in her own world, oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is just running and running, such a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an absolutely odd situation this is to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll look down and discover the flood soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
